entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 12:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 12:24 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:24 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:24 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
